name: Dodger Ball 🥏🥏🥏
description:
Welcome to Dodger Ball game, how far do you think you can go? Test your Arcade , casual Gaming skills and see If you can score 1,000 which I bet you can't. 🎯😑.  Can't  👎 👎 👎🎯🎯

Tap the left and right side of the screen to divert the balls coming at you!👊👊👊

The higher your score, the faster the balls come..... 💯💯💯

Go Dodge some balls as soon as possible! 🎯🎯 🎮 🎮
